        public void addListener(TerminalListener listener)

        Parameters:

      • run

        public void run()
        What is doing the thread.

        Will check if there is a reader available containing the wanted name (will call TerminalListener.cardReaderRemoved() ()} if a listener is removed or added). If it is the case it will wait for a card placed, call TerminalListener.cardAdded(RFIDCard), wait for the card to be removed then call TerminalListener.cardRemoved()

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Used to stop the thread.
